plan_context.query: Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. It should be one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.and write it onto a notion page called quantum

steps.task: Using the query 'Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are' and the provided data, search for current performance information on quantum computers to obtain details on their speed.
Compose a short note in one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes on how fast quantum computers currently are by using the information from the search result provided in $quantum_search_result.

inputs.name: $quantum_search_result
inputs.description: Search result containing information on the speed and performance of quantum computers

steps.task: Write the composed note onto a Notion page called quantum. The note content is taken from the variable $quantum_note.

inputs.name: $quantum_note
inputs.description: Composed note on the current speed of quantum computers
